ygData.messageBody:
> The gentleman in the post below reminded me of a bit of
> advice I always give
> to lower level wizards when they ask me "What level 8 (or
> 12 or 16) spells
> should I buy?" I tell them to buy them all.

I think that that is probably sound advice, but it does get rather
pricey... At higher levels spells go up to 9 and 10 platinum a piece.
I'm already saving up for my level 20 spells (need 60 plat I think).
I like the idea of having all spells just because I like to tinker
with them and see how they work. I skipped the spell Eye of Zomm when
I reached that level but now I'm planning to buy it anyway to raise
that particular skill. Also, someone told me it can be used to open
locked door in Befallen, which is a neat trick!

Aznyin
Level 17 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
